template:
[ { "type":"git_clone_pull", "params":{ "repository":"https://github.com/lzb-snowball/platform" } }, { "type":"git_clone_pull", "params":{ "repository":"https://github.com/lzb-snowball/platform" } }, { "type":"git_clone_pull", "params":{ "repository":"https://github.com/lzb-snowball/platform" } }, { "type":"maven_install", "params":{ "path":"@/parent" } },
{ "type":"cmd", "params":{ "cmd":"sshpass -p \"aaaaaaaaa\" scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -q @/platform/snowball-user/target/snowball-user.jar root@192.168.1.1:/project/snowball/snowball-user.jar " } }, { "type":"cmd", "params":{ "cmd":"cd /project/snowball && ps aux | grep 'snowball-user.jar' | awk '{print { "type":"cmd", "params":{ "cmd":"cd /project/snowball && ps aux | grep 'snowball-user.jar' | awk '{print module}' | xargs kill -9 || true && java -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -Dloader.path=/project/snowball/lib -jar -Dspring.profiles.active=prod,platform /project/snowball/snowball-user.jar " } }, }' | xargs kill -9 || true && java -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -Dloader.path=/project/snowball/lib -jar -Dspring.profiles.active=prod,platform /project/snowball/snowball-user.jar " } }, {} ]
